main.name: Thanh Cong Nguyen
main.bio: I am currently studying Computer Science at the University of San Francisco. I enjoy music, soccer, basketball, and coding.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Relevant courses: Introduction to Python | Introduction to Java

work.description: I have developed a strong foundation in Computer Science through my academic coursework. Additionally, I have actively pursued personal projects, which have allowed me to apply my skills and enhance my problem-solving abilities. I am eager to bring my passion, dedication, and willingness to learn to a professional environment and contribute to the team's success.
